data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations this is to inform you that Dr. Sanjay Sethi has completed his term as the Managing Director and CEO of the Company and shall be retiring from the services of the Company.

Further the shareholders of the Company have approved appointment of Mr. Shwetank Singh as the Managing Director and CEO and Dr. Sanjay Sethi as a Non-Executive Director of the Company with effect from February 1 2026.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Reg 30 and 52 of the Listing Regulations the Board at its meeting held today has considered and approved:

(i) proposed acquisition of a company owning a resort property at Udaipur in the state of Rajasthan with around 150 rooms at a proposed consideration of Rs.171 crore (subject to adjustments for Net Assets/Liabilities)

(ii) appointment of Mr. Shwetank Singh as the Managing Director and CEO of the Company with effect from February 1 2026.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations this is to inform you that Chalet Hotels Limited is participating in an Analyst Meet being hosted by K Raheja Corp Group (Group) scheduled to be held on December 2 2025 at Trident BKC Mumbai.

Mr. Ravi C Raheja and Mr. Neel C Raheja Non-Executive & Non-Independent Directors (Promoters) of Chalet Hotels Limited and other entities forming a part of the Group together with members of their respective management teams will meet and address analysts at the said event. Also the Group will inter-alia present its direction across businesses. The Companys presentation for the meet will be shared in due course and hosted on the website of the Company.

The said meet is subject to change due to exigencies on the part of the analysts / management team.

We request you to take the same on record.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On July 31 2025 For The Quarter Ended June 30 2025
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors at its meeting held today considered and approved:
- Statement of Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30 2025
- Further Dr. Sanjay Sethi had conveyed his intention to retire from his executive responsibility upon completion of his tenure as Managing Director and CEO on January 31 2026. Based on the recommendation of Compensation Nomination and Remuneration Committee the Board approved the appointment of Mr. Shwetank Singh as Managing Director and CEO Designate. He will assume the role of Managing Director and CEO with effect from February 1 2026.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On July 31 2025 For The Quarter Ended June 30 2025
data.news_body:

- Further Dr. Sanjay Sethi had conveyed his intention to retire from his executive responsibility upon completion of his tenure as Managing Director and CEO on January 31 2026. Based on the recommendation of Compensation Nomination and Remuneration Committee the Board approved the appointment of Mr. Shwetank Singh as Managing Director and CEO Designate. He will assume the role of Managing Director and CEO with effect from February 1 2026.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On July 31 2025
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of Regulations 30 and 52 read with Schedule III of the Listing Regulations this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. on July 31 2025 has inter-alia considered and approved:

- the Statement of Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30 2025 in accordance with the provisions of Regulations 33 and 52 of the Listing Regulations.

- approved the appointment of Mr. Shwetank Singh as the Managing Director & CEO Designate. He will assume the role of Managing Director & CEO with effect from February 1 2026.
 
It is also proposed that Dr. Sanjay Sethi will continue as a Non-Executive Non-Independent Director effective February 1 2026.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2023.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Listing Regulations, the Board of Directors at its meeting held on May 9, 2023 has considered and approved:

- the Statement of Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023. 

- the re-appointment of Mr. Sanjay Sethi as the Managing Director and CEO and Key Managerial Personnel of the Company for a further period of 2 (two) years w.e.f.                 February 9, 2024 upto January 31, 2026.

Further, the Board of Directors of the Company:
- has not recommended any dividend on the listed securities, viz the Equity Shares of the Company
- has approved payment of dividend of Re.1/- per share on the unlisted security viz. Non-Convertible Redeemable Preference Shares, amounting to Rs.1,600/- in accordance with the terms of their issue.

The meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 11.30 a.m. and concluded at 1.30 p.m.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Listing Regulations, the Board of Directors at its meeting held on May 9, 2023 has approved:

1. the Statement of Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023.

2. the re-appointment of Mr. Sanjay Sethi as the Managing Director and CEO and Key Managerial Personnel of the Company for a further period of 2 (two) years w.e.f. February 9, 2024 upto January 31, 2026.

Further, the Board of Directors of the Company:

- has not recommended any dividend on the listed securities, viz the Equity Shares of the Company.
- has approved payment of dividend of Re.1/- per share on the unlisted security viz. Non-Convertible Redeemable Preference Shares, amounting to Rs.1,600/- in accordance with the terms of their issue.

The meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 11.30 a.m. and concluded at 1.30 p.m.

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we are attaching herewith a copy of the presentation prepared by the Company for the earnings call scheduled to be held today i.e. on Tuesday, January 24, 2023 at 4.30 p.m. (IST), in respect of the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022, which have been approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held earlier today.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, please be informed that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e., on January 24, 2023 has, inter-alia, considered and approved:
- the Statement of Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022, in accordance with the provisions of Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations;
- conversion of the erstwhile Accenture Learning Centre Tower at Bengaluru into additional ~140 hotel rooms.

Further, the proposed addition of 88 rooms which were in a warm-shell condition at Novotel Nagar Road Pune is nearing completion and the process of handover to the hotel team has commenced. The said hotel is under the Company's wholly owned subsidiary i.e. Belaire Hotels Private Limited.

The meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 11.30 a.m. and concluded at 1.30 p.m.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting For Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Reg 30 the Listing Regulations, the Board at its meeting held today i.e., on July 28, 2022 has approved
- Statement of Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2022, in accordance with the provisions of Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations;
- raising of funds upto an amount not exceeding Rs.100 Crore by way of borrowing from the Company's Promoters for meeting expenses for the Koramangala Project;
- raising of funds in the form of Non-Convertible Debentures in one or more tranches, including but not limited to, for the purpose of refinancing high cost debt, upto an amount of Rs.500 Crores in the aggregate from time to time.

Further, the Company has been awarded the bid for building of a Hotel opposite Terminal 3 at Delhi by Delhi International Airport Limited (DIAL), which was approved by the Board, including the incorporation of an SPV for the purpose of implementation of the said project at Delhi

data.news_body:
